H0.text: Yigal Amir assassinated whom in 1995. Yitzhak Shamir

H1.text: Yigal Amir assassinated whom in 1995. Shimon Peres

H2.text: Yigal Amir assassinated whom in 1995. Ariel Sharon

H3.text: Yigal Amir assassinated whom in 1995. Rabbin

A4.text: Yigal Amir assassinated Yitzhak Rabin in 1995

A5.text: Yigal Amir assassinated the incumbent prime minister of Israel

A6.text: Yigal Amir was tried for Rabin's murder

A7.text: Yigal Amir was convicted and sentenced to life imprisonment for Rabin's murder
